page.title: 05INDUSTRIES
page.content: In Leigh Sinton there are eight industries. A main industry is farming. Its main produce is Eggs from Beards, Apples from Norburys, Christmas trees from Leigh Sinton Farms and strawberries from Montandons.The other industries are the old wheelwright's shop,a forge and a haulage firm.There are two garages,one has a room for spraying,an office and a workshop for preparing cars for the M.O.T test.The Haulage firm carries fruit mostly and is involved in operations all over the country.In the summer there are many pickers to be seen on the fields and in the autumn the hopfields are just as populated.In the days before christmas many cars can be seen carrying away their trees for the coming celebrations.
